displayName.english: I Used 25 Spi-Roll Attacks In A Game!
I Used 50 Spi-Roll Attacks In A Game!
I Am A True Rock 'N Roll Star!  I Saved the Earth!
I Destroyed 500 Asteroids In A Single Game!
I Wrecked 1,000 Asteroids In A Single Game!
I Obliterated 2,500 Asteroids In A Single Game!
I have PASSED (with a C grade) in Rock 'N Roll!
B Stands for Brilliant!  I am Better than your "average" hero!
A Stands for Awesome, Amazing, and Astonishing!

description.english: I am an Ace at Rock 'N Roll!  Bring on 'dem rocks!

displayName.english: How do you get more Awesome than a mere A?

description.english: Devastate the rocks and baddies in Rock 'N Roll! A+ baby!

displayName.english: 5 Beautiful Glimmering G.E.O.S. Gems Obtained!

description.english: 10% chance to save the Earth, let's go!

displayName.english: 10 G.E.O.S. Gems Ain't Cheesy.. or Easy!

description.english: 20% chance to save the Earth, let's go!

displayName.english: 25 G.E.O.S. Gems!  Holy Play Hooky To Save an Earth Day!

description.english: 50% chance!  Come on baby, don't fail me now!

displayName.english: 50,000 points isn't bad, right?

description.english: ..Hey this game ain't easy, don't tease me!

displayName.english: 100,000 points.  Piece of cake!

description.english: ..Hand over a cold beer to go this this cake now eh?

displayName.english: 200,000 points, I could do this all day with my eyes closed!

description.english: Now watch and you might learn something... *CRASH!*

displayName.english: Half a million points, just a walk in the park!

description.english: Hey, wake me up when something happens here, will ya?

displayName.english: I'm a Millionaire!  ..Too bad it's only points and

description.english: a silly achievement on this crazy asteroid blasting game, hmm?

displayName.english: I just got a Fail game, err I mean Full game achievement!

description.english: Fail.. Full.. Potato, Patato  ..It's an achievement anyhow!

displayName.english: haXX0r I am!  And proud of it mind you!

description.english: When it comes to saving the Earth, anything goes I say!

displayName.english: I'm totally BAE.. "Busy As Ever"!!

description.english: You expect me to save the world when I got SUCH a BUSY life?!?

displayName.english: I went all in and bought M.E.S.A protection !!

description.english: My daddy always told me to "use protection" and well.. Now I've bought some protection!

displayName.english: I'm Soooo Dizzy!  Weeee!  Maximum Rotation Speed!!

description.english: ..Ain't wastin' no time, I can turn on a dime!

displayName.english: Don't Mess With Me!  I'm a Bad Bad Man!

description.english: Bad to the Bone.. My Fire Power is Full Blown!

displayName.english: Gotta mission to save the world.. Momma didn't raise no fool!

description.english: They say diamonds are forever, but this G.E.O.S. gem might be more clever!

displayName.english: I didn't mean to shoot the one chance I had at saving you..

description.english: But I'm not on my A-game without my Dew!

displayName.english: I Took them Triple Points of "K-OS" and I did NOT die!

description.english: These Bull Riders think lasting 8 seconds is tough.. pfft, Try lasting 30 seconds with K-OS!

displayName.english: That horrible vaporous red evil space blob ATE me!  OMG!

description.english: Now I know how it feels to be one of my potato chips!

displayName.english: I got my first kill of something that isn't a Rock!

description.english: That thing.. I thought at first that it was trying to help me shoot the rocks.. then I realized I was in serious trouble!

displayName.english: I killed that slimy green space snake before it "blowed me up"!

description.english: They just keep coming!  Those things will explode their acidic innards all over your shiny pretty space ship!

displayName.english: Holy Hell, where did that thing come from?  I killed it, I killed it!

description.english: They call it the VDS.. I call it my worst nightmare.  It's moving vaporous eyes are such horror!

displayName.english: Yahoo!  I just earned my first extra life!

description.english: Life out here is pretty grim, but I need all I can get to save my loved ones back on Earth!

displayName.english: Five Extra Ships baby!  That is NOT easy!  Yay me!

description.english: Five extra lives out here can be lost in mere seconds!  But I cannot give up!

displayName.english: I just found something real "purty" called Rhodium!

description.english: OMG, this stuff is worth a TON! .Now where's a McD's when you need one?!

displayName.english: Dang, this is nice looking stuff, it's gotta be worth somethin'!

description.english: ..It might be pretty, but it don't make good toilet paper if you run out!  Just sayin'!

displayName.english: Gold looks so much shinier when you're out in space!

description.english: ..It must be the clean air out here making this gold so.. well gold.

displayName.english: I just went Platinum baby!

description.english: ..And people always told me I couldn't sing!  This platinum proves them all wrong!

displayName.english: I found something pretty decent called "iridium"!

description.english: When I first saw the iridium, I thought it was like a big chocolate kiss wrapped in shiny foil!

displayName.english: It's bluer than the Earth back home.

description.english: It's so blue, it makes me feel blue and miss home and my family!

displayName.english: This is the biggest darned Nickel I've ever seen!

description.english: It's called nickel and worth only slightly more!

displayName.english: Titanium! Wow! I'm rich! I'm rich!  This stuff gotta be worth millions!

description.english: ...It's worth less than that Nickel I found!  What?! ..This space hub is rippin' me off!

displayName.english: Oh darn, it's just a big chunk of Iron!  Whew!

description.english: ..I could have swore it was another darn asteroid and I was dead, but I heard the sound of the ship collector, woot! woot!

displayName.english: If I ever live through this, I might start mining asteroids more often!

description.english: $250,000 and all I can spend it on is this space ship!  Argh!

displayName.english: Half a million already!? Wow, this is sure easier than working fastfood service!

description.english: Half a million dollars and not a single pizza joint anywhere around!

displayName.english: I'm a millionaire!  One million bucks I've earned  baby!!

description.english: I wish I could hire those Vaporous Death things to work for me instead of trying to kill me!

displayName.english: What is this CANNON doing out here in Space?!! Can I harvest that iron?

description.english: WoooHooooo!! Mommmmmmy!  Ohhhh Wowwwww!  Yeee Hawwww!

displayName.english: I like "purty" things!  I have now scooped up 10 Rhodiums!
It's 10 Osmium I gathered, NOT "opium" as in drugs!  Geez!
With all this 10 gold I've collected.. I should be able to make me a nice "golden" stack of pancakes! Mmm..
I just hit 10 times "Platinum" baby!  Look at me go!

description.english: ..With this last platinum, I just matched Garth Brooks first album from 1989, as that album also got 10 platinum too!  Woohoo!

displayName.english: I can't get "rid" of "Iridium".. Now I've got TEN!
10 X Cobalt, holy moly!  ..I'll have a blue "Cobalt" Christmas without you!

description.english: "You'll be dead and in fright with your Christmas of Plight.. But I'll have a blue, blue, blue, blue Cobalt Christmas!"

displayName.english: Cha-Ching!  I just found my 10th Nickel out here in space!  Would be nice to find like a Quarter now!

description.english: "10 Nickels = 50 cents... Ugh. ..I'll never be able to buy that faster fire power at this rate!"

displayName.english: 10 Titaniums now!  Sounds important!  (It's really not! Nickels are more valuable!)

description.english: They may not be worth much, but they would look nice hangin' on my Christmas tree

displayName.english: These little asteroid wanna-be things!  Argh, I got 10 of them now!

description.english: "The first iron cluster scared me as I hit it, now they are just annoying!"

displayName.english: I've now collected 10 of each pretty, shiny, thing out here!

description.english: "It's nice to have a hobby that you enjoy when you're out in space killing monsters, shooting asteroids, and saving the world!"

displayName.english: Resource Hoarder! ..20 of each!

description.english: "Mine!  All Mine!  Give me!  Mine!  Gimme, Giime!"

displayName.english: 100% Authentic Play!  No In-Game Cheats Activated!

description.english: "I may not be able to save the Earth, but nobody.. I mean NOBODY can ever say I saved humanity by cheating!"

displayName.english: I've now pawned 10 Iron balls!  A penny saved, a penny earned!

description.english: "They gave me that look when I pawned them dull dirty iron balls, but I held my head high!"

displayName.english: I done learned how to make 'dat money!  10 'dem Rhodiums sold now!

description.english: "It's really hard to part with something so purty, but I told it that it was me, not it when I left it"

displayName.english: OMG! I "KILT" every asteroid rock thing!  It's all gone!  Did I win?  I won huh?!?
Another wave of them rocks gone!  I feel like they will never end..

description.english: "5 waves of asteroids, so many close deaths..  But they are worth it!  Gotta save 'em"

displayName.english: That's the 10th wave of Asteroids blasted!  So many rocks!

description.english: "Each new wave presents more danger, more crumbles, more aliens.. Can I do it?"

displayName.english: 15 waves of Asteroids!  Holy hell in space!  Gotta keep pushin'!

description.english: "I swear these asteroids are trollin' me now.. is this a really bad dream?  Wake up self!  Wake up!"

displayName.english: I just got SHOT while flying that fast!! That's GOTTA be Auto-Aim!

description.english: "That thing, that thing is cheatin'!  How do I report that thing for hackin' with auto-aim!?"

displayName.english: I am an official "8008" by getting that exact score, 8008 uploaded to the leaderboards..

description.english: Proud to use external cheat applications to HACK.. making me an official BOOB!

displayName.english: I just made a new friend in space!

description.english: This little A55 Kicker really kicks some ass!

displayName.english: Mother Sucker!  Wow.. I'm good at sucking this junk up!

description.english: I just learned how much fun it is to suck!  Yummy!

displayName.english: I'm getting soo good at sucking it all up baby!

description.english: Mmm, Mmm, Good.. Sucking it All up 5 times in a single game!  Sluurrrrp!

displayName.english: I am a true Rock Breaker!

description.english: 5,000 Rocks Shattered.. and counting!

displayName.english: 10K Rock RAWKER!

description.english: 10,000 Rocks you say?  ..I'm just getting started!

displayName.english: Two Million Bones!

description.english: Millions come EASY when you're this damn good!

displayName.english: OMG! I'm an 8 Second Man!

description.english: It's not easy lasting 8 seconds before exploding!

displayName.english: I'm a 30 Second Dream Machine!

description.english: Holding it for 30 whole seconds takes mad skills!

displayName.english: 45 Seconds Baby!  Get in Line!

description.english: You gotta get in line if you wanna play now!  I got massive lasting power here!

displayName.english: 90 Seconds of Pure Perfection!

description.english: I'm just getting warmed up, are you ready for more?

displayName.english: 1 Minute of Frantic, Furious Action!

description.english: Who ain't got time for a minute man?!  Call on me whenever you got a minute to spare baby!

displayName.english: 2 Minutes. Double the Fun!

description.english: I never thought I could last two minutes, but it went by too fast honey!

displayName.english: 3 Whole Minutes Equals Triple Pleasure!

description.english: First I tried the 2 min action, now I'm loving the 3 min!

displayName.english: 4 Fabulous Minutes is how I rock it!

description.english: I just gave it 4.. had so much fun that I wanna last a few more!

displayName.english: 5 Minutes I Stayed Alive!  High Five!

description.english: Not anyone can last 5 minutes of that wild ride, but I lasted and held my pride!

displayName.english: I Scored 1,000+ in Hard Rock Mode!

description.english: Nothin' to be shy about, 1k points is worthy with only one life to live!

displayName.english: I just achieved 2,500 points in the hardest of hard times!

description.english: Hard Rock Mode: 2,500 Points!  Respect this!

displayName.english: 5,000 Points in Hard Rock mode!

description.english: Bow to me now.  Before I give you my 5k "pow"!

displayName.english: You Can't Top This!  TEN THOUSAND in Hard Rock Baby!

description.english: The skills required to get 10k is higher than what's needed to be in the NFL today!

displayName.english: 10 Fast Paced, Furious Minutes!

description.english: Who wouldn't want someone who can last 10+ minutes at this kinda action!?

displayName.english: 15 Minutes of Hard C.. err R..ock Action! I'm a Rock 'n Roll God!

description.english: I dare anyone to last this long!

displayName.english: 20 Mind Blastin' Hard & Fast Minutes of This!?

description.english: You can't handle this!  ..You can't handle me baby!

displayName.english: Half an Hour Of Pure Perfection!  RAWR!

description.english: I am truly One-In-A-Million!  I'm THAT damn good!

displayName.english: 25,000 Points in Hard Rock Madness!  Holy Smokes I'm Good!

description.english: Instincts of a cheetah, Blessed Skills of the Heavens!  That's Me Baby!

displayName.english: I collected my first Zaxpoleon Dynamite!
I've collected FIVE Zaxpoleon Dynamites!
I've collected TEN Zaxpoleon Dynamites!
I've collected TWENTY FIVE Zaxpoleon Dynamites!
Oops! I done blown up my A55 Kicker!
ARGH! I blew myself!  What an explosion! Sheesh!
Take that boss man!  I exploded on you!  Rawr!
Kamikaze That Mr Space Worm!  Blown to HELL! Ha!
I blew that tentacle looking bastard to kingdom come!
I just blasted my first asteroid with Zaxpoleon Dynamite! WhooHooo!

description.english: What a freakin' Blast!

displayName.english: It wasn't easy, but I ain't cheesy!

description.english: That lightning shootin' alien ship just got REKT by yours truly!

displayName.english: That damn dynamite saved my life!  That red space blob is vaporized!
I done learned a whole lot about well.. about rocks and shiny stuff!

description.english: Momma didn't raise no fool!

displayName.english: I tried going "All In" with "Up Your A55" and I gotta say, It is Amazing!

description.english: "Up Yours Too Buddy!"  ;-)

displayName.english: No obstacle is too big if you set your mind to beating it!

description.english: Monster Rock + Me = Pile of Dust!

displayName.english: I didn't let good ol' earth take even a scratch baby!
I was getting lazy out in space, drinking a cold beer

description.english: And then this big ugly green rock thing did appear!

displayName.english: I kicked his ass!  Yeah!  The bigger they are, the harder they fall!

description.english: Oh My God did he leave a lot of parts in my way!
